attributes.action: Add more female trains in Thomas and Friends
attributes.background: I am a girl who loves Thomas and I have noticed there hasn't been many female characters into the show and Thomas the Tank Engine/Thomas and Friends give morals to each episode, and if the audience see a female train, more of the female audience would want to become a train driver.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to add more female trains in Thomas and Friends is up to the writers of Thomas and Friends.
